Browse the source code of codebrowser/external/boringssl/src/crypto/x509/x509_txt.c

57#include <openssl/asn1.h>
58#include <openssl/buf.h>
59#include <openssl/cipher.h>
60#include <openssl/evp.h>
61#include <openssl/lhash.h>
62#include <openssl/mem.h>
63#include <openssl/obj.h>
64#include <openssl/x509.h>
65
66
67const char *X509_verify_cert_error_string(long n)
68 {
69 static char buf[100];
70
71 switch ((int)n)
72 {
73 case X509_V_OK:
74 return("ok");
75 case X509_V_ERR_UNABLE_TO_GET_ISSUER_CERT:
76 return("unable to get issuer certificate");
77 case X509_V_ERR_UNABLE_TO_GET_CRL:
78 return("unable to get certificate CRL");
79 case X509_V_ERR_UNABLE_TO_DECRYPT_CERT_SIGNATURE:
80 return("unable to decrypt certificate's signature");
81 case X509_V_ERR_UNABLE_TO_DECRYPT_CRL_SIGNATURE:
82 return("unable to decrypt CRL's signature");
83 case X509_V_ERR_UNABLE_TO_DECODE_ISSUER_PUBLIC_KEY:
84 return("unable to decode issuer public key");
85 case X509_V_ERR_CERT_SIGNATURE_FAILURE:
86 return("certificate signature failure");
87 case X509_V_ERR_CRL_SIGNATURE_FAILURE:
88 return("CRL signature failure");
89 case X509_V_ERR_CERT_NOT_YET_VALID:
90 return("certificate is not yet valid");
91 case X509_V_ERR_CRL_NOT_YET_VALID:
92 return("CRL is not yet valid");
93 case X509_V_ERR_CERT_HAS_EXPIRED:
94 return("certificate has expired");
95 case X509_V_ERR_CRL_HAS_EXPIRED:
96 return("CRL has expired");
97 case X509_V_ERR_ERROR_IN_CERT_NOT_BEFORE_FIELD:
98 return("format error in certificate's notBefore field");
99 case X509_V_ERR_ERROR_IN_CERT_NOT_AFTER_FIELD:
100 return("format error in certificate's notAfter field");
101 case X509_V_ERR_ERROR_IN_CRL_LAST_UPDATE_FIELD:
102 return("format error in CRL's lastUpdate field");
103 case X509_V_ERR_ERROR_IN_CRL_NEXT_UPDATE_FIELD:
104 return("format error in CRL's nextUpdate field");
105 case X509_V_ERR_OUT_OF_MEM:
106 return("out of memory");
107 case X509_V_ERR_DEPTH_ZERO_SELF_SIGNED_CERT:
108 return("self signed certificate");
109 case X509_V_ERR_SELF_SIGNED_CERT_IN_CHAIN:
110 return("self signed certificate in certificate chain");
111 case X509_V_ERR_UNABLE_TO_GET_ISSUER_CERT_LOCALLY:
112 return("unable to get local issuer certificate");
113 case X509_V_ERR_UNABLE_TO_VERIFY_LEAF_SIGNATURE:
114 return("unable to verify the first certificate");
115 case X509_V_ERR_CERT_CHAIN_TOO_LONG:
116 return("certificate chain too long");
117 case X509_V_ERR_CERT_REVOKED:
118 return("certificate revoked");
119 case X509_V_ERR_INVALID_CA:
120 return ("invalid CA certificate");
121 case X509_V_ERR_INVALID_NON_CA:
122 return ("invalid non-CA certificate (has CA markings)");
123 case X509_V_ERR_PATH_LENGTH_EXCEEDED:
124 return ("path length constraint exceeded");
125 case X509_V_ERR_PROXY_PATH_LENGTH_EXCEEDED:
126 return("proxy path length constraint exceeded");
127 case X509_V_ERR_PROXY_CERTIFICATES_NOT_ALLOWED:
128 return("proxy certificates not allowed, please set the appropriate flag");
129 case X509_V_ERR_INVALID_PURPOSE:
130 return ("unsupported certificate purpose");
131 case X509_V_ERR_CERT_UNTRUSTED:
132 return ("certificate not trusted");
133 case X509_V_ERR_CERT_REJECTED:
134 return ("certificate rejected");
135 case X509_V_ERR_APPLICATION_VERIFICATION:
136 return("application verification failure");
137 case X509_V_ERR_SUBJECT_ISSUER_MISMATCH:
138 return("subject issuer mismatch");
139 case X509_V_ERR_AKID_SKID_MISMATCH:
140 return("authority and subject key identifier mismatch");
141 case X509_V_ERR_AKID_ISSUER_SERIAL_MISMATCH:
142 return("authority and issuer serial number mismatch");
143 case X509_V_ERR_KEYUSAGE_NO_CERTSIGN:
144 return("key usage does not include certificate signing");
145 case X509_V_ERR_UNABLE_TO_GET_CRL_ISSUER:
146 return("unable to get CRL issuer certificate");
147 case X509_V_ERR_UNHANDLED_CRITICAL_EXTENSION:
148 return("unhandled critical extension");
149 case X509_V_ERR_KEYUSAGE_NO_CRL_SIGN:
150 return("key usage does not include CRL signing");
151 case X509_V_ERR_KEYUSAGE_NO_DIGITAL_SIGNATURE:
152 return("key usage does not include digital signature");
153 case X509_V_ERR_UNHANDLED_CRITICAL_CRL_EXTENSION:
154 return("unhandled critical CRL extension");
155 case X509_V_ERR_INVALID_EXTENSION:
156 return("invalid or inconsistent certificate extension");
157 case X509_V_ERR_INVALID_POLICY_EXTENSION:
158 return("invalid or inconsistent certificate policy extension");
159 case X509_V_ERR_NO_EXPLICIT_POLICY:
160 return("no explicit policy");
161 case X509_V_ERR_DIFFERENT_CRL_SCOPE:
162 return("Different CRL scope");
163 case X509_V_ERR_UNSUPPORTED_EXTENSION_FEATURE:
164 return("Unsupported extension feature");
165 case X509_V_ERR_UNNESTED_RESOURCE:
166 return("RFC 3779 resource not subset of parent's resources");
167
168 case X509_V_ERR_PERMITTED_VIOLATION:
169 return("permitted subtree violation");
170 case X509_V_ERR_EXCLUDED_VIOLATION:
171 return("excluded subtree violation");
172 case X509_V_ERR_SUBTREE_MINMAX:
173 return("name constraints minimum and maximum not supported");
174 case X509_V_ERR_UNSUPPORTED_CONSTRAINT_TYPE:
175 return("unsupported name constraint type");
176 case X509_V_ERR_UNSUPPORTED_CONSTRAINT_SYNTAX:
177 return("unsupported or invalid name constraint syntax");
178 case X509_V_ERR_UNSUPPORTED_NAME_SYNTAX:
179 return("unsupported or invalid name syntax");
180 case X509_V_ERR_CRL_PATH_VALIDATION_ERROR:
181 return("CRL path validation error");
182
183 case X509_V_ERR_SUITE_B_INVALID_VERSION:
184 return("Suite B: certificate version invalid");
185 case X509_V_ERR_SUITE_B_INVALID_ALGORITHM:
186 return("Suite B: invalid public key algorithm");
187 case X509_V_ERR_SUITE_B_INVALID_CURVE:
188 return("Suite B: invalid ECC curve");
189 case X509_V_ERR_SUITE_B_INVALID_SIGNATURE_ALGORITHM:
190 return("Suite B: invalid signature algorithm");
191 case X509_V_ERR_SUITE_B_LOS_NOT_ALLOWED:
192 return("Suite B: curve not allowed for this LOS");
193 case X509_V_ERR_SUITE_B_CANNOT_SIGN_P_384_WITH_P_256:
194 return("Suite B: cannot sign P-384 with P-256");
195
196 case X509_V_ERR_HOSTNAME_MISMATCH:
197 return("Hostname mismatch");
198 case X509_V_ERR_EMAIL_MISMATCH:
199 return("Email address mismatch");
200 case X509_V_ERR_IP_ADDRESS_MISMATCH:
201 return("IP address mismatch");
202
203 default:
204 BIO_snprintf(buf,sizeof buf,"error number %ld",n);
205 return(buf);
206 }
207 }
208
209
210
